Una bestia: le hizo sexo oral a su hija de 5 años, ahora irá 9 años a la cárcel
06 Nov 2019 by Policiales
A través de un juicio abreviado, la Justicia bandeña condenó a un incalificable sujeto a 9 años de cárcel por abusar sexualmente de su hija de cinco años, aprovechando que su esposa dormía.
La unidad de Delitos Contra la Integridad Sexual de La Banda -coordinada por la Dra. María Alicia Falcione- solicitó al juez de control y garantías que homologue un acuerdo de juicio abreviado.
La representante del Ministerio Público ventiló en la audiencia que la causa comenzó en el mes de noviembre del 2018, cuando la menor le relató a su madre que su padre durante la noche le había practicado sexo oral.
Ante la confesión de la pequeña, la mujer confrontó a su esposo quien se excusó diciendo que estaba alcoholizado y no sabía qué era lo que hacía. El sujeto le rogó de rodillas a su pareja que no denunciara, pero al ver que ella no cambiaría su determinación, comenzó a amenazarla.
La madre de la menor radicó la denuncia, por lo que la Dra. Falcione ordenó que la niña sea examinada por el forense. El galeno reveló que la pequeña presentaba lesiones compatibles con su relato.
Más tarde, fue entrevistada por los psicólogos en Cámara Gesell y allí nuevamente contó que su padre, aprovechando que su mamá dormía, se metió en su cama para ultrajarla.
Durante la audiencia, el acusado -quien se encontraba en compañía de su abogado defensor- tomó la palabra y ante las preguntas del juez, reconoció haber sometido a la pequeña.
El magistrado ante la postura de ambas partes homologó el acuerdo y condenó al sujeto a 9 años de cárcel. Luego dispuso que inmediatamente sea trasladado al Penal de Varones.

A beast: he made oral sex to his 5-year-old daughter, now he will go to jail for 9 years
06 Nov 2019 by Policiales
Through an abbreviated trial, the Banden Justice sentenced an unqualified person subject to 9 years in prison for sexually abusing his five-year-old daughter, taking advantage of his wife's sleep.
The unit of Crimes Against Sexual Integrity of La Banda -coordinated by Dr. María Alicia Falcione- requested the judge of control and guarantees to approve an abbreviated trial agreement.
The representative of the Public Ministry said at the hearing that the cause began in November 2018, when the child told her mother that her father had had oral sex during the night.
Before the confession of the child, the woman confronted her husband who excused himself by saying that he was alcoholic and did not know what he was doing. The subject begged his partner to kneel not to report, but seeing that she would not change his determination, he began to threaten her.
The mother of the child filed the complaint, so Dr. Falcione ordered that the girl be examined by the coroner. The doctor revealed that the girl had injuries compatible with her story.
Later, she was interviewed by psychologists at Gesell Chamber and there again she said that her father, taking advantage of his mother's sleep, got into his bed to outrage her.
During the hearing, the defendant - who was in the company of his defense lawyer - took the floor and, in response to the judge's questions, acknowledged having submitted the child.
The magistrate before the position of both parties approved the agreement and sentenced the subject to 9 years in prison. He then ordered that he be immediately transferred to the Men's Prison.
